body: Hi Mostapha, maybe I have good news. Giving the full permission at the user to modify the ladybug directory I've found this result although the testAccess.gh gives a false for F [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/*tHd*uipNJB5i7ky8Qbj7oX6hIq884Iivwu4KLqAGN*o62VnzeOruWE3fm3r0Du-dz*jvSQxawmZsV3iupbmqxptxauSEuM1/Cattura.PNG)thanks for your help
